languages.text: {n}Исследование, предпринятое Механикус, выявило дефекты в работе чанов рождения Горнила. Именно они привели к столь странной покорности Блаженных. Техножрецы с ужасом отказались от идеи "улучшить" святую реликвию, потому Фолстоун остался без своих молчаливых работников, но бесценные знания предтеч, добытые Механикус, сами по себе были великой наградой.{/n}

{n}The Tech-Priests' investigation uncovered a number of defects in the operation of the birthing vats within the Crucible. It was these defects that caused such strange obedience within the Touched. The proposition of making improvements to a sacred relic filled the Tech-Priests with the most profound dread, and thus Foulstone was left without its taciturn workers. However, the priceless knowledge extracted by the servants of the Omnissiah was a great reward in and of itself.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Исследование, предпринятое Механикус, выявило дефекты в работе чанов рождения Горнила. Именно они привели к столь странной покорности Блаженных. Техножрецы с ужасом отказались от идеи "улучшить" святую реликвию, потому Фолстоун остался без своих молчаливых работников, но бесценные знания предтеч, добытые Механикус, сами по себе были великой наградой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}However, the knowledge extracted from the specimens of the Blessed by the Tech-priests had revealed many new ways of cultivation and engineering wonders to the inhabitants of Foulstone. This knowledge allowed the Blessed to continue their work with great care and skill.{/n}

{n}However, the knowledge extracted from the specimens of the Blessed by the Tech-priests had revealed many new ways of cultivation and engineering wonders to the inhabitants of Foulstone. This knowledge allowed the Blessed to continue their work with great care and skill.{/n}

However, the priceless knowledge extracted by the servants of the Omnissiah was a great reward in and of itself.{/n}

languages.text: {n}技术神甫的调查发现了熔炉培育皿操作中的部分缺陷，正是这些缺陷导致了受召者诡异的顺从，而改进圣物的提议给技术神甫们带来极大的恐惧。尽管荒寂岩地失去了那些沉默寡言的工人，但是，欧姆尼塞亚仆人所提取的无价知识本身就是一种巨大的回报。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priests' investigation uncovered a number of defects in the operation of the birthing vats within the Crucible. It was these defects that caused such strange obedience within the Touched. The proposition of making improvements to a sacred relic filled the Tech-Priests with the most profound dread, and thus Foulstone was left without its taciturn workers. However, the priceless knowledge extracted by the servants of the Omnissiah was a great reward in and of itself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}技术祭司的调查发现了熔炉培育皿操作中的部分缺陷，正是这些缺陷导致了受召者诡异的顺从，而改进圣物的提议给技术祭司们带来极大的恐惧。尽管荒寂岩地失去了那些沉默寡言的工人，但是，欧姆尼塞亚仆人所提取的无价知识本身就是一种巨大的回报。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La investigación de los tecnosacerdotes reveló una serie de defectos en el funcionamiento de los tanques de parto del Crisol. Fueron estos defectos los que provocaron la extraña obediencia de los Tocados. La propuesta de realizar mejoras en una reliquia sagrada llenó a los tecnosacerdotes del más profundo temor, por lo que Rocainmunda se quedó sin sus silenciosos trabajadores. Sin embargo, el inestimable conocimiento extraído por los siervos del Omnissiah era una gran recompensa en sí mismo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priests' investigation uncovered a number of defects in the operation of the birthing vats within the Crucible. It was these defects that caused such strange obedience within the Touched. The proposition of making improvements to a sacred relic filled the Tech-Priests with the most profound dread, and thus Foulstone was left without its taciturn workers. However, the priceless knowledge extracted by the servants of the Omnissiah was a great reward in and of itself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La investigación de los tecnosacerdotes reveló una serie de defectos en el funcionamiento de los tanques de parto del Crisol. Fueron estos defectos los que provocaron la extraña obediencia de los Tocados. La propuesta de realizar mejoras en una reliquia sagrada llenó a los tecnosacerdotes del más profundo temor, por lo que Rocainmunda se quedó sin sus silenciosos trabajadores. Sin embargo, el inestimable conocimiento extraído por los siervos del Omnissiah era una gran recompensa en sí mismo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}技術司祭の調査により、坩堝内の分娩槽の稼働に多数の不具合があることが判明した。触れられし者に奇妙な服従特性があったのは、こうした不具合があったためだった。神聖な遺物に改良を加えるという提案に、技術司祭たちは心からの恐怖で満たされた。かようにして、ファウルストーンは無口な労働者を失うこととなった。しかし、万機神の従者たちによって引き出された貴重な知識は、それ自体が大きな報いとなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priests' investigation uncovered a number of defects in the operation of the birthing vats within the Crucible. It was these defects that caused such strange obedience within the Touched. The proposition of making improvements to a sacred relic filled the Tech-Priests with the most profound dread, and thus Foulstone was left without its taciturn workers. However, the priceless knowledge extracted by the servants of the Omnissiah was a great reward in and of itself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭の調査により、坩堝内の分娩槽の稼働に多数の不具合があることが判明した。触れられし者に奇妙な服従特性があったのは、こうした不具合があったためだった。神聖な遺物に改良を加えるという提案に、技術司祭たちは心からの恐怖で満たされた。かようにして、ファウルストーンは無口な労働者を失うこととなった。しかし、万機神の従者たちによって引き出された貴重な知識は、それ自体が大きな報いとなった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'enquête des technoprêtres révèle dans les cuves matricielles du Creuset un certain nombre de défauts, qui étaient la cause de l'obéissance absolue et aveugle des Altérés. La seule idée d'apporter des améliorations à une relique sacrée plonge les technoprêtres dans une sainte terreur, et Rochepeste doit composer sans ses serviteurs taciturnes. Malgré tout, les connaissances extraites par les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie constituent une récompense inestimable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priests' investigation uncovered a number of defects in the operation of the birthing vats within the Crucible. It was these defects that caused such strange obedience within the Touched. The proposition of making improvements to a sacred relic filled the Tech-Priests with the most profound dread, and thus Foulstone was left without its taciturn workers. However, the priceless knowledge extracted by the servants of the Omnissiah was a great reward in and of itself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'enquête des technoprêtres révèle dans les cuves matricielles du Creuset un certain nombre de défauts, qui étaient la cause de l'obéissance absolue et aveugle des Altérés. La seule idée d'apporter des améliorations à une relique sacrée plonge les technoprêtres dans une sainte terreur, et Rochepeste doit composer sans ses serviteurs taciturnes. Malgré tout, les connaissances extraites par les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie constituent une récompense inestimable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Ermittlungen der Techpriester ergaben eine Reihe von Defekten im Betrieb der Brutgefäße innerhalb des Tiegels. Diese Defekte lösten den merkwürdigen Gehorsam in den Berührten aus. Der Vorschlag, Verbesserungen an einer heiligen Reliquie vorzunehmen, erfüllte die Techpriester mit größtem Unbehagen, und so musste Foulstone auf seine schweigsamen Arbeiter verzichten. Das unschätzbar wertvolle Wissen, das die Diener des Omnissiah extrahierten, war allein schon eine große Belohnung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priests' investigation uncovered a number of defects in the operation of the birthing vats within the Crucible. It was these defects that caused such strange obedience within the Touched. The proposition of making improvements to a sacred relic filled the Tech-Priests with the most profound dread, and thus Foulstone was left without its taciturn workers. However, the priceless knowledge extracted by the servants of the Omnissiah was a great reward in and of itself.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahiplerin araştırması, Pota'nın içindeki doğum fıçılarının işleyişinde bir miktar kusur açığa çıkardı. Mütehassislerin böylesine tuhaf bir itaatkârlığa sahip olmalarına bu kusurlar neden olmuştu. Kutsal bir yadigâra geliştirmeler yapma önerisi, Tekno Rahipleri muazzam bir korkuyla doldurdu. Menfurtaş ise suskun işçilerinden oldu. Ancak Hermesih'in hizmetkârları tarafından ayıklanan paha biçilemez irfan, başlı başına büyük bir ödül oldu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priests' investigation uncovered a number of defects in the operation of the birthing vats within the Crucible. It was these defects that caused such strange obedience within the Touched. The proposition of making improvements to a sacred relic filled the Tech-Priests with the most profound dread, and thus Foulstone was left without its taciturn workers. However, the priceless knowledge extracted by the servants of the Omnissiah was a great reward in and of itself.{/n}
